subtitle: An example of OptiFine random entity textures
description:
This is an example resource pack that shows users how to create OptiFine random entity textures.

Included examples:
- Randomised textures
- Weight based textures
- Name based textures
- Biome based textures
- NBT based textures

Using the provided examples, you should be able to understand how OptiFine random entity textures works, and be able to apply it to your own resource pack.
optifine: OptiFine is used to add support for random entity textures.
